alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 9:47AM CDT until July 14 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR WESTERN DAWSON COUNTY... At 946 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of Oconto to 10 miles north of Moorefield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. In addition, at 936 AM CDT, the public reported quarter size hail 6 miles south-southeast of Maxwell in Lincoln County. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cozad, Gothenburg, Willow Island and Farnam. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 228. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
